price: On the Day when they will be dragged into the Fire on their faces, [they will be told], “Taste the agony of Hell[18]!”
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُسۡحَبُونَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمۡ ذُوقُواْ مَسَّ سَقَرَ
footnotes: [18] "Saqar" is one of the names of Hell.
